ns:common.topic.description: Scriptol is an object-oriented programming language that allows users to declare an XML document as a class. The language is universal and allows users to create dynamic web pages, as well as create scripts and binary applications.
rdfs:label: Scriptol

ns:common.document.text: Scriptol is an object-oriented programming language  that allows users to declare an XML document as a class. The language is universal and allows users to create dynamic web pages, as well as create scripts and binary applications.

ns:type.object.name: Scriptol
